IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE STUDENT EDUCATION FOR STUDENTS IN A PRIVATE PREPARATORY HIGH SCHOOL
IRS990.Desc: STUDENT EDUCATION FOR APPROXIMATELY 320 STUDENTS IN A PRIVATE PREPARATORY HIGH SCHOOL

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE LARGEST PORTION OF THE ENDOWMENT EARNINGS CAN BE USED FOR DAY TO DAY OPERATIONS. THE REMAINDER OF THE ENDOWMENT EARNINGS CAN BE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIP. THE PRINCIPAL OF ALL THE ENDOWMENTS ARE PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED.
LOSS ON SALE OF FIXED ASSETS INCLUDED IN FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES -6,081.
LOSS ON SALE OF FIXED ASSETS INCLUDED IN FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES 6,081.
ALL PUBLISHED AND BROADCASTED ADVERTISING CONTAINS A STATEMENT OF A NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY.
GRANT WAS RECEIVED FROM USDA RURAL DEVELOPMENT.
HEAD OF SCHOOL IS PARTICIPATING IN A 457 PLAN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT AND THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEWED THE RETURN BEFORE IT WAS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND ALL KEY EMPLOYEES SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND DISCLOSURE EVERY YEAR. ALL DISCLOSURES ARE REVIEWED AND MAINTAINED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL HIRES AN INDEPENDENT CONSULTANT TO DEVELOP INFORMATION ON THE HEADMASTER'S COMPENSATION RELATIVE TO COMPETITIVE PRIVATE SCHOOLS' HEADMASTERS. THIS INFORMATION IS THEN REVIEWED WITH THE HEADMASTER COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD, COMPRISED ENTIRELY OF INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS, WHO MAKES THE COMPENSATION DECISION FOR THE HEADMASTER. COMPETITIVE DATA ON THE COMPENSATION OF OTHER FORM 990 REPORTED EMPLOYEES AT THE SCHOOL IS DEVELOPED FROM PUBLISHED PRIVATE SCHOOL COMPENSATION INFORMATION AND REVIEWED WITH THE HEADMASTER. COMPENSATION DECISIONS FOR THESE EMPLOYEES, ALONG WITH COMPETITIVE COMPENSATION INFORMATION ARE THEN REVIEWED BY THE HEADMASTER COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD, COMPRISED ENTIRELY OF INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS. COMPENSATION OF ALL FORM 990 EMPLOYEES IS REPORTED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD AS PART OF THE FORM 990 REVIEW PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEARS.
